# IAPW package

# What is it?
This package provides convenience functions to import data from laboratory devices etc. at the Institute of Aquaculture and Protection of Water, Faculty of Fisheries and Protection of Waters, University of South Bohemia, České Budějovice, Czech Republic.

# Installation

You can install the latest version of the IAPW package using the following command:

```{r eval=FALSE}
require(devtools)
devtools::install_github("TellAnAx/IAPW")
```
